titleStmt.title: Three contending brethren, Mr. Williams, Mr. Lob, Mr. Alsop, reconcil'd, and made friends by an occasional conference with three notorious hereticks, Mr. Humphreys, Mr. Clark, Dr. Crisp. By Calvin Anti-Crispian.
titleStmt.author: Trepidantium Malleus.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Harris at the Harrow in Little Britain,
